channel.title: The Rebels (Faction Suggestion) (WIP)
channel.description:
The rebels are BD who rebelled against the other BD and now want to take over the Kingdom!!!
The Rebels can only have four members at a time, They will start off with a Chief and a Henchman
> [color=111reddder]The Chief, Rebels, Special :shield::sparkles:[/color] > = > Passive 1: Royal Blood - Your votes count as 2 in king elections. > > Passive 2: I'm Chief!!! - You are immune to death at night, occupation/target change, you will also appear to be BD the first time you are checked by an observer, > > Day Ability 1: Hehe Be Scared - Scare a player removing their royal blood passive, will not notify them unless they try to become king, 2 use > > Night Ability 1: Rebel Against Them!! - Convert a player to be a rebel, 2 day recharge time > > Night Ability 2: Join Us Or Else - Kill a player, unlimited uses, can only be used after the Henchman is dead
> [color=111reddder]The Henchman, Rebels, Killer :shield: :hocho:[/color] > = > Passive 1: Determined To Takeover- If you get attacked you will live one extra day, unless healed > > > Day Ability 1: Suffocation - make a player unable to breath making them unable to talk for the day, they will die in 2 nights unless healed, 2 use > > Night Ability 1: Help us or... - Kill a player
> [color=11redder] The Retainer, Rebels, Offensive :dagger:[/color] > = > Converts from Butler > > Passive 1: Rebellion - You're immune to occupation/target change > > Day Ability 1: Bewilder - Make someone unable to use their day abilities, 2 use > > Night Ability 1: Wine Heaven - Forcefully make a player drink so much wine that they will become drunk and will receive incorrect info, does not notify them, 3 use > Examples: > Princess will see a person as kill/off while flirting > Princess will see that a person killed someone while using WoW > Observer will see a person as a Rebel while peeking > Negotiator will see a person as a Rebel while investigating > Drunk will think they did not succeed while debauching a person > Butler will think they did not succeed while serving wine to a person > Noble will see empty logs while snooping > Phys will think that he succeed while healing self or other person > > Night Ability 2: Rebel Party: Same as normal party
Feedback/suggestions are needed, also feel free to give me better names, also this is a WIP

item.title: The Rebels (Faction Suggestion) (WIP)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
The rebels are BD who rebelled against the other BD and now want to take over the Kingdom!!!

The Rebels can only have four members at a time, They will start off with a Chief and a Henchman

The Chief, Rebels, Special

Passive 1: Royal Blood - Your votes count as 2 in king elections.

Passive 2: I’m Chief!!! - You are immune to death at night, occupation/target change, you will also appear to be BD the first time you are checked by an observer,

Day Ability 1: Hehe Be Scared - Scare a player removing their royal blood passive, will not notify them unless they try to become king, 2 use

Night Ability 1: Rebel Against Them!! - Convert a player to be a rebel, 2 day recharge time

Night Ability 2: Join Us Or Else - Kill a player, unlimited uses, can only be used after the Henchman is dead

The Henchman, Rebels, Killer

Passive 1: Determined To Takeover- If you get attacked you will live one extra day, unless healed

Day Ability 1: Suffocation - make a player unable to breath making them unable to talk for the day, they will die in 2 nights unless healed, 2 use

Night Ability 1: Help us or… - Kill a player

The Retainer, Rebels, Offensive

Converts from Butler

Passive 1: Rebellion - You’re immune to occupation/target change

Day Ability 1: Bewilder - Make someone unable to use their day abilities, 2 use

Night Ability 1: Wine Heaven - Forcefully make a player drink so much wine that they will become drunk and will receive incorrect info, does not notify them, 3 use
Examples:
Princess will see a person as kill/off while flirting
Princess will see that a person killed someone while using WoW
Observer will see a person as a Rebel while peeking
Negotiator will see a person as a Rebel while investigating
Drunk will think they did not succeed while debauching a person
Butler will think they did not succeed while serving wine to a person
Noble will see empty logs while snooping
Phys will think that he succeed while healing self or other person

Night Ability 2: Rebel Party: Same as normal party

Feedback/suggestions are needed, also feel free to give me better names, also this is a WIP

Read full topic
